House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00519
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7166, ENTITLED "SYNCHRONIZED NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS AND FOR ELECTORAL REFORMS" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Increases the campaign spending for President from Ten Pesos (P10.00) to Fifty Pesos (P50.00) for every voter; and for congressman and other local officials from Five Pesos (P5.00) to Thirty-Five Pesos (P35.00) for every voter.
